page.title: 15ROSE GROWERS
page.content: Cocker's Roses, Aberdeen. Cocker's Roses is famous throughout the world for its fine roses. The size of the farm is 130 acres. They grow about 100,000 roses each year. There are 16 people employed by the company. The farm is over 140 years old and the company has been growing roses for many years. Cocker's roses are sent to every country except Australia and Africa. They also supply the city of Aberdeen with many of the beautiful roses which line the streets. They have helped Aberdeen to win the Britain in Bloom contest on many occasions.
